title: A Call to Repentance
summary: Summary for Zephaniah 2. This chapter proclaims God's judgment on the nations and the promise of hope for those who seek Him.

faq.question: What is the central message of Zephaniah 2?
faq.answer: God will judge the wicked but also restore those who are faithful.

faq.question: What hope does Zephaniah 2 offer?
faq.answer: That God's people will be purified and rejoice in His salvation.
